name: Bitter Dream
summary: Bitter Dream is a set of 10 MBF21 maps with all original music composed by LVENdead, intended to take you on a dark, cosmic journey with a variety of gameplay and a loose narrative thread. Maps start off easy and escalate to fairly challenging by the end by most reasonable measures. Bitter Dream will take most players between 5-6 hours to complete, as there are a few longer maps in the set. As such, it has been divided into 3 distinct Episodes.
